additional_info: • • • Let me know if there are any UI bugs appear • • • ***Lastest update*** Update 19/09/2019 - 11:10 + Fix Some UI bugs Update 02/24/2019 - 19:30 + Fix Some UI bugs *old logs* Update 08/31/2018 + Fix login interface + Add 5 Color Schemes in Customize Setting (Purple Pink, Sea Blue, Silver Pink, Coral Red, Turquoise) Update 05/09/2018 + Release Dark Theme feature (beta) 09/07/2018 > Fix UI 09/09/2018 > Complete Group UI 09/10/2018 > Complete Event UI 09/15/2018 > Fix some text bugs 09/16/2018 > Update UI Update 10/11/2018 + Add 4 Color Schemes in Customize Setting: ++ Pale Pink(Specially for girl) ++ Earth Yellow ++ Dark Rose ++ Navy Purple
